name: South Coast Children's Services
description: Accepts donations of children's items, toys, books, and clothing to support programs serving children and families on the South Coast
fullDescription: South Coast Children's Services accepts donations of children's items to support their programs serving families with children on San Mateo County's South Coast.
whatTheyOffer:
- Accept children's item donations
- Accept toys and books
- Accept children's clothing
- Serves South Coast families
- Items go to children in need
- Support family programs
howToGetIt:
1. Contact South Coast Children's Services
2. Check accepted items list
3. Bring children's items to donate
4. Items distributed to local families
5. Support South Coast programs
6. Get donation receipt
keywords: South Coast, children donation, donate toys, donate books, donate children clothing, Pescadero, Half Moon Bay, family programs, kids items
